Entries.1116027/f Maru {{MinFriendship}}/O Maru/: continue/-10000 -1000/farmer -100 -100 2 Maru -100 -100 2/skippable/warp Maru -100 -100/warp farmer -100 -100/faceDirection Maru 2/viewport 64 15 clamp true/pause 2000/playSound doorClose/warp farmer 64 15/pause 500/move farmer 0 2 2/playSound doorClose/warp Maru 64 15/pause 300/faceDirection farmer 1 true/pause 100/faceDirection farmer 0/speak Maru "Honey! Wait!"/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 500/speak Maru "Oh, good. I caught you before you got to work!#$b#There's something very special happening today, honey.#$b#It only happens once a month, but tonight there's going to be a beautiful lunar eclipse in the sky.#$b#The moon will turn red, and a lovely glow will bask our quiet valley for a few minutes.#$b#I really want to watch it, @, so I was wondering if...#$b#...you maybe wanted to join me tonight? We could camp out in the backwoods for a private little viewing party!"/pause 1000/question fork0 "Go on a date with {{SpouseDisplayName}}?#Yes#No"/fork dateYes/playMusic none/pause 1000/emote Maru 28/speak Maru "Oh...$s#$b#Too busy again?$s"/pause 500/faceDirection Maru 3 true/pause 1000/emote Maru 40/pause 400/faceDirection Maru 2/pause 400/speak Maru "It's okay, we'll do it some other time. You just get back to work.#$b#I'll just watch it alone, I guess.$s"/pause 800/faceDirection Maru 1 true/pause 100/faceDirection Maru 0/pause 400/playSound doorClose/warp Maru -100 -100/pause 2000/end dialogue Maru "Don't worry, I'm not upset.#$b#I know you're busy...I knew what I was getting into when I married you."
Entries.dateYes: pause 200/addMailReceived maruLunarDateAgree/emote Maru 20/pause 500/speak Maru "Awesome! This is going to be so fun!$h#$b#Meet me at the backwoods after 8. I'll set up our little viewing area.#$b#We'll be two little starwatchers all alone looking at the universe above.$l#$b#I can't wait!$h"/pause 500/end dialogue Maru "It's going to be so beautiful tonight, @. I can't wait.$l#$b#Remember, come to the backwoods after 8. I'll set everything up.$l"

Entries.1116028/n maruLunarDateAgree/t 2000 2600: spaceMusic/21 14/farmer 20 18 0 Maru 22 15 1/makeInvisible 16 9 15 15/addTemporaryActor TelescopeDN 16 32 20 14 2 false/addTemporaryActor CampfireDN 16 32 23 15 2 false/addTemporaryActor TentDN 49 80 22 12 2 false/skippable/friendship Maru {{FriendBonus}}/move farmer 0 -1 1/move farmer 1 0 0/faceDirection Maru 2/move farmer 0 -2 1/faceDirection Maru 3 true/speak Maru "Hi, honey.$l#$b#I'm glad you came.$l"/pause 300/emote farmer 32/speak Maru "So, what do you think about our little camp?"/pause 200/move Maru 0 -1 1/move farmer 1 0 1 true/move Maru 1 0 2 false/pause 100/shake Maru 250/addLantern 935 23 15 3/showFrame CampfireDN 1/playSound fireball/pause 800/question null "#It's great, Maru!#It looks so cozy.#I love the firepit!"/pause 200/emote Maru 32/pause 200/speak Maru "Thanks, honey! I tried to make it as cozy and warm as it could be."/pause 500/speak Maru "Oh! And one more thing..."/shake Maru 250/playSound pickUpItem/showFrame CampfireDN 2/emote farmer 16/pause 200/speak Maru "I brought some fish we can fry over the fire out here. It's the true camping experience, @!"/pause 200/emote farmer 32/pause 200/move Maru -1 0 2/faceDirection farmer 0/shake Maru 250/playSound pickUpItem/pause 200/speak Maru "[198] Here, @. I hope it tastes good!"/pause 200/move Maru 1 0 2/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 300/farmerEat 198/pause 1250/message "Yum! Hot and crispy, perfect! Maru cooked it just right!"/pause 300/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 200/shake Maru 250/playSound eat/pause 200/shake Maru 250/playSound eat/pause 400/speak Maru "Wow! These are great!"/pause 400/speak Maru "I'm full, haha. I could eat this all day.$h"/pause 300/speak Maru "Thanks again for coming, @.$l#$b#The eclipse should be happening any second now..."/pause 600/playSound shadowpeep/glow 255 0 0 true/pause 100/emote Maru 16 true/emote farmer 16/pause 200/speak Maru "That's it! It's happening! Come on, honey, let's look!"/pause 600/faceDirection farmer 0/move Maru -2 0 3/move farmer 0 -1 3/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/beginSimultaneousCommand/changeToTemporaryMap NightSceneMaruMap/viewport -1000 -1000/warp CampfireDN 1000 1000/removeObject 23 15/warp TelescopeDN 1000 1000/warp TentDN 1000 1000/addTemporaryActor MoonLunarEclipseDN 40 40 13 9 2 false/addLantern 935 14 9 3/warp Maru 14 29/faceDirection Maru 3/warp farmer 15 29/faceDirection farmer 3/endSimultaneousCommand/pause 400/fade/viewport 14 25/pause 300/speak Maru "Wow...it's beautiful! I can't believe I'm witnessing this!$h"/pause 300/faceDirection Maru 1/speak Maru "Here, honey, you look!"/pause 200/move Maru 0 1 0/move farmer -1 0 3/pause 300/viewport move 0 -2 7500/pause 500/speak Maru "A lunar eclipse happens when our planet comes in between the Moon and Sun.#$b#The Moon becomes basked in Earth's shadow, and the only light the Moon receives is the red tint of our sunset."/pause 500/speak Maru "When I was little, I used to stare at the sky and wonder what the stars and planets really meant.#$b#Is there really a meaning to our existence? I suppose we'll never know."/pause 1000/viewport move 0 2 7500/speak Maru "I always thought...$s#$b#No...$s#$b#I always knew...$l#$b#...that the stars would guide me through my life."/pause 300/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 200/speak Maru "The first time I looked at a lunar eclipse like this, my father asked me something...#$b#He told me 'Maru, there is little point studying the galaxy. We will never be able to explore it in our lifetimes, nor will our children, and nor will their children after that. Life should be focused here, on the ground.'.#$b#I never understood why he said that. I always wanted to explore the unknown.#$b#Now, I think it's clear I won't be around to see what's truly out there, but, strangely...#$b#I can accept that."/pause 300/speak Maru "After meeting you, @...$l#$b#I wouldn't want to be anywhere else!"/pause 300/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/beginSimultaneousCommand/changeLocation Backwoods/makeInvisible 16 9 15 15/warp MoonLunarEclipseDN 1000 1000/removeObject 14 9/warp CampfireDN 23 15/addLantern 935 23 15 3/warp TelescopeDN 20 14/warp TentDN 22 12/warp Maru 21 14/warp farmer 22 14/faceDirection Maru 1/faceDirection farmer 3/endSimultaneousCommand/pause 400/fade/viewport 21 14/pause 1000/speak Maru "It's very symbolic if you think about it.#$b#Red can represent anger, frustration, negativity...#$b#But it can also represent love, warmth, and passion."/pause 500/speak Maru "I'm so lucky to have you in my life, @... I hope you're happy to have me in your life as well."/pause 200/emote farmer 20/pause 200/positionOffset farmer -5 10/pause 10/playSound pickUpItem/faceDirection farmer 1 true/showFrame farmer 101/animate Maru true true 500 28/pause 2500/stopAnimation Maru 4/positionOffset farmer 5 0/showFrame farmer 6/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 1000/playSound shadowpeep/stopGlowing/emote Maru 16/pause 200/faceDirection Maru 2/speak Maru "Looks like the eclipse is over, honey. The Moon has passed through our planet's loving shadow and is back to its normal, silver self."/pause 300/textAboveHead Maru "*Yawn*"/pause 500/faceDirection Maru 1/speak Maru "I'm getting tired, @. What do you say we retire to the tent for the evening?"/pause 300/move farmer 2 0 3 true/move Maru 2 0 1 false/pause 500/speak Maru "Hey, @...$l#$b#I have one more surprise for you in the tent...$l"/pause 200/emote farmer 16/faceDirection Maru 0/pause 100/warp Maru 1000 1000/move farmer -1 0 0/pause 500/warp farmer 1000 1000/pause 1000/shake TentDN 60000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/changePortrait Maru Beach/pause 1000/speak Maru "Ha...that was great...$l#$b#I'm exhausted after that! Let's go to sleep now, honey...$h"/pause 500/message "I had a stellar night watching the eclipse with Maru. It was so romantic!"/pause 1300/end newDay
